Header.title: The Financial Success Roadmap
Header.paragraph: We chart your course to financial success, building bridges to a secure and prosperous future. Your personalized roadmap to financial freedom, guiding you every step of the way.

About.paragraph: Our vision is to be a trusted financial services provider that creates sustainable value for its stakeholders.
Why: aims to promote entrepreneurship and innovation.
aims to provide financial services to the common person.
Why2: aims to promote economic development and growth.

Services.name: Home Loan
Services.text: Eligible borrowers can avail Home Loan with an attractive interest rate, low Equated Monthly Instalments (EMIs) and no pre-payment charges on floating Home Loan interest rates. Flexible loan tenure with easy repayment options.

Testimonials.text: "The product is very flexible and the product team is open to customize the product as per the needs of the business."
Testimonials.name: Krishna Sharma - Noida

Testimonials.text: "The P&C Finance App makes it easy to pay EMIs from anywhere, anytime."
Testimonials.name: Chittrang Mishra

Testimonials.text: " The PandC app offers home loans at low interest rates.Its services are good for entrepreneurs, business families, and professionals."
Testimonials.name: Sandeep Sharma - Firozabad

Testimonials.text: "They were very helpful plus answered all my questions and also very clear in describing my bike policy."
Testimonials.name: Ananya Singhania - Mumbai

Testimonials.text: "I received the call from Shriram finance, they have offered me a personal loan which I accepted. The executive came and collected the documents the very next day. The process took only 48 hours and the loan amount got disbursed. The process was easy and no issues."
Testimonials.name: Dhanraj Singh - Agra

Features.title: Instant Sanction
Features.text: Get instant provisional sanction in few steps.

Features.title: Zero Foreclosure Charges
Features.text: Applicable only for Home Loan with floating rate of interest.
